title: OpenAI Gives Pentagon AI Model Access After Anthropic Dustup
description: OpenAI has agreed to deploy its own artificial intelligence models within the Defense Department’s classified network after rival Anthropic PBC saw its relationship with the Pentagon implode over surveillance and autonomous weapons concerns.
content:
OpenAI has agreed to deploy its own artificial intelligence models within the Defense Department’s classified network after rival Anthropic PBC saw its relationship with the Pentagon implode over surveillance and autonomous weapons concerns.

title: OpenAI Reaches A.I. Agreement With Defense Dept. After Anthropic Clash
description: The deal came hours after President Trump had ordered federal agencies to stop using artificial intelligence technology made by Anthropic, an OpenAI rival.
content: OpenAI, the maker of ChatGPT, said on Friday that it had reached an agreement with the Pentagon to provide its artificial intelligence technologies for classified systems, just hours after President Trump ordered federal agencies to stop using A.I. t... [2189 chars]

title: US stocks sink and oil prices rise as worries about AI, inflation and possible war hit Wall Street
description: NEW YORK — US stocks sank Friday as Wall Street kept punishing companies that could become losers in the artificial-intelligence revolution. A surprisingly discouraging update on inflation also hurt the market, while oil prices climbed with worries about tensions between the United States and Iran.
content: NEW YORK — US stocks sank Friday as Wall Street kept punishing companies that could become losers in the artificial-intelligence revolution. A surprisingly discouraging update on inflation also hurt the market, while oil prices climbed with worries a... [4945 chars]

title: Wall Street Week Ahead: AI disruption hangs over US markets as investors wary of risks
description: Artificial intelligence is creating uncertainty for the US stock market. Investors are watching closely for how this technology will change businesses. Key economic reports and company earnings are due soon. Experts are debating whether companies will benefit from AI or be replaced by it. This debate is causing market jitters.

title: Anthropic Hits Back After US Military Labels It a 'Supply Chain Risk'
description: Anthropic says it would be “legally unsound” for the Pentagon to blacklist its technology after talks over military use of its artificial intelligence models broke down.
content: United States Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth directed the Pentagon to designate Anthropic as a “supply-chain risk” on Friday, sending shockwaves through Silicon Valley and leaving many companies scrambling to understand whether they can keep using... [6359 chars]

title: AI a huge opportunity and serious risk for climate: UNEP official
description: New Delhi, Feb 28 (PTI) Artificial Intelligence (AI) offers significant potential to help the climate crisis, but its high energy and water requirements could worsen environmental challenges if not managed properly, a senior official of the United Nations (UN) said. In an interview with PTI Videos, Martin Krause, Director of the Climate Change Division at […]

title: AI's Role in Climate Change: Opportunity or Risk?
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) offers potential climate solutions but poses environmental risks due to its energy and water demands, according to Martin Krause of UNEP. At the India AI Impact Summit, experts discussed AI's role in renewable energy integration and called for sustainable practices to mitigate its environmental impact.
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) holds promise for tackling the climate crisis, but its substantial energy and water needs could exacerbate environmental problems if not managed responsibly, says a United Nations (UN) official. Martin Krause, UNEP's Clim... [955 chars]

title: US stocks fall on credit, war jitters as oil surges
description: Friday’s drop drove the S&P 500 to its biggest monthly loss since March. Anxiety about an artificial-intelligence bubble resurfaced as OpenAI raised $110 billion.
content:

title: AI's Dual Role: Climate Saviour or Environmental Risk?
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) holds promise for climate change solutions but presents environmental risks due to its energy and water requirements. UNEP's Martin Krause emphasizes AI's dual role while advocating for sustainable practices like renewable energy for data centers. UNEA-7 has endorsed a resolution for AI's eco-friendly deployment.
